activities:
PatientsLikeMe collects and deidentifies data provided by individuals in the context of their overall health and experience with disease. This data largely consists of medications used by a individual, primary outcome scores relevant to one or more chronic conditions, and symptom scores. PatientsLikeMe also polls its user base with opt-in questionnaires. PatientsLikeMe allows, but does not require, users to identify a .jpeg "avatar" associated with their user profile. 

This information, provided entirely on a voluntary basis, is then appropriately deidentified for consumption by external bodies in the academic, non-profit, government, and commercial sectors.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: user provided data either processed manually (paper surveys) or volunteered online or by linking devices or other data sources to their profiles
recoursemech: Independent recourse mechanisms are available through complainants pursuing recourse via European Union data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
